site_name: Evelyn House, 5-31 Eastmoor Street, Charlton, SE7 8LX
description: An application submitted under Section 96a of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a non-material amendment in connection with the planning permission 20/2186/F, dated 06/05/2022 for the construction of a part 4/part 6/part 7 storey building comprising Class C3 residential use (67 units) and Class B1 business use, with associated amenity and play space, public realm, access, car and cycle parking, refuse and recycling storage and sub-station, in order to allow variation of Condition 2 (Approved Drawings) and Condition 38 (Child Playspace) to facilitate the following amendments:Reduction of curtain walling width to match left side (North elevation). Brick piers to be introduced to the recessed brickwork to give structural stability to the doors. An additional pedestrian entrance door to the ground floor car park on the north elevation.Removal of windows in the side returns on the eastern and western elevations.Amendment of the glazing and opening pattern of the balcony doors.Amendment of the glazing pattern of upper floor windows.Amendment of the brick panel recess from 25mm to 15mm. Amendment to the hard and soft landscaping layout.  Addendum Flood risk assessment to the submitted FRA that was produced and approved under planning permission 20/2186/F .
